channel.title: Port/ip help please!
channel.description:
hi everyone. my server problem is that i have a ricscape v4 server (customized of course) and it is a really good server. my comps port is 10666, and i edited the server file to make the listen port to 10666, to match my port, but how do i change the ip on the server txt file? this is wat it says now:starting ricscape v4 on 0.0.0.0:10666. i want it to say: starting ricscape v4 on (my ip):10666
valid help that makes the server work will result in you becoming a admin in my server!
thanks, robsta 2007 :D

item.title: Port/ip help please!
item.dc:creator: @robsta2007 robsta2007
item.description:
@robsta2007 wrote:

no, wat i meant to say, was that other ppl cant join my server, how do i make it so ppl can join? my port is opened, it is 10666

Read full topic

item.title: Port/ip help please!
item.dc:creator: @digzey digzey
item.description:
@digzey wrote:

oh ffs… lol… thats not port anyways go and find ricscape v4 in server.java by going edit find then replace it to say what you want

Read full topic
